Class HomeApplianceDAO

java.lang.Object
HomeApplianceDAO
public class HomeApplianceDAO extends Object
The HomeApplianceDAO class is responsible for interacting with the SQLite database to perform CRUD operations on the appliance data. It provides methods to retrieve, insert, update, and delete home appliance records from the database.
Author:
dominic cash

  • Method Details

    • connect

      protected Connection connect()
      Establishes a connection to the SQLite database.
      Returns:
      a Connection object to interact with the database, or null if the connection fails

    • findAllProducts

      public List<HomeAppliance> findAllProducts()
      Retrieves all products (appliances) from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of HomeAppliance objects containing details of all products in the database

    • getAllCategories

      public List<String> getAllCategories()
      Retrieves all distinct categories from the appliance database.
      Returns:
      a list of unique categories

    • getProductsByCategory

      public List<HomeAppliance> getProductsByCategory(String category)
      Retrieves products (appliances) from the database based on the specified category.
      Parameters:
      category - the category to filter products by
      Returns:
      a list of HomeAppliance objects in the specified category

    • getProductsByDescription

      public List<HomeAppliance> getProductsByDescription(String searchTerm)
      Retrieves products (appliances) from the database based on a search term in the description.
      Parameters:
      searchTerm - the term to search for in the product description
      Returns:
      a list of HomeAppliance objects that match the search term in their description

    • getProductsByCategoryAndPriceRange

      public List<HomeAppliance> getProductsByCategoryAndPriceRange(String category, String priceRange)
      Retrieves products (appliances) based on both category and price range.
      Parameters:
      category - the category to filter products by
      priceRange - the price range to filter products by (e.g., "0-50", "51-100", etc.)
      Returns:
      a list of HomeAppliance objects in the specified category and price range

    • getProductsByPriceRange

      public List<HomeAppliance> getProductsByPriceRange(String priceRange)
      Retrieves products (appliances) based only on price range.
      Parameters:
      priceRange - the price range to filter products by (e.g., "0-50", "51-100", etc.)
      Returns:
      a list of HomeAppliance objects in the specified price range

    • findProduct

      public HomeAppliance findProduct(int id)
      Finds a product by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the product to find
      Returns:
      a HomeAppliance object representing the product, or null if not found

    • insertItem

      public boolean insertItem(HomeAppliance appliance)
      Inserts a new product into the database.
      Parameters:
      appliance - the HomeAppliance object to insert
      Returns:
      true if the product was successfully inserted, false otherwise

    • updateItem

      public boolean updateItem(HomeAppliance appliance)
      Updates an existing product in the database.
      Parameters:
      appliance - the HomeAppliance object with updated details
      Returns:
      true if the product was successfully updated, false otherwise

    • deleteItem

      public boolean deleteItem(int id)
      Deletes a product from the database based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the product to delete
      Returns:
      true if the product was successfully deleted, false otherwise
